Name: Smart Moves
About the game: 'Smart moves' is a combination of puzzle and turn-based mechanics. Destroy monsters, open chests! The hero can attack monsters when hero and monster are standing on neighboring square. Avoid being the first at a distance of impact! The hero can't skip turns, but can use level objects - or other monsters - to “skip” the turn. Every game level is a puzzle with its own logical solution. Our experiments with game mechanics require a good understanding from the player how objects interact with each other in the game world. The game has original game art style. You get a new playing experience where game mechanics are of maximum importance.
